Description: Here we have A Rare 2006 Gibson Vegas Standard Semi-Thin Hollowbody in Natural finished . Made ONLY for A couple of years before being discontinue by Gibson, so it's very limited produced. This one has hardly been played at all .....ALL factory original...Unmolested & CLEAN ( only abit of pick scratches thats hard to see from a foot away and polished swirls ). We had it for almost 10 years and maybe got 15 minutes of playing time on it , THATS IT !! Neck is straight and frets are excellent....Such Lite weight with Excellent tone to match for days !! But, the new owner WILL need a setup done to their preference due to lack of activity the last 10 years ! No repairs done to it nor needed one ! Comes in a Gibson HSC in Excellent condition with some paperwork along with it. Sold as is !! PayPal ONLY......Payment within 2 days Fedex shipping only... signature required !! Fixed rate shipping NON NEGOTIABLE (insurance included ) !!! Only within the cont 48 states Thanks for looking....Feel free to ask questions Nice Holiday Gift !!
Title: Gibson Vegas Standard 2006 Discontinue & Rare
